BlaBlaLines | Software Engineer | Paris, France | Onsite | Fulltime

My name is Ricardo and I’m a software engineer at BlaBlaCar. BlaBlaCar is the global leader in long-distance carpooling. We’re an innovative and fast-growing company building a unique community of 60+ million members to transform the way people travel across the world!

I’m part of the team working on BlaBlaLines, a service focused on short-distance. The current project goal is to iterate quickly and take over the commuting carpooling market.

We are looking for 2 back end engineers to work with us on our Python/Flask app. We have lots of interesting challenges and you will be working with us on an exciting new service.

Apply here: http://smrtr.io/SjsW

- We are also looking for a Senior Android Engineer to join our mobile team: http://smrtr.io/SL2r

- All open positions at BlaBlaCar: https://careers.smartrecruiters.com/BlaBlaCar/
